description: Gets a list of messages associated with an Amazon Q Business web experience.

parameters.name: conversationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business web experience conversation.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier for the Amazon Q Business application.

nested_items.name: messages
nested_items.description: An array of information on one or more messages.

nested_items.name: messageId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business web experience message.

nested_items.name: body
nested_items.description: The content of the Amazon Q Business web experience message.

nested_items.name: time
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the first Amazon Q Business web experience message.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of Amazon Q Business message, whether HUMAN or AI generated.

nested_items.name: attachments
nested_items.description: A file directly uploaded into an Amazon Q Business web experience chat.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of a file uploaded during chat.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of a file uploaded during chat.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The message explaining the Amazon Q Business request error.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The code associated with the Amazon Q Business request error.

nested_items.name: attachmentId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q Business attachment.

nested_items.name: conversationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q Business conversation.

nested_items.name: sourceAttribution
nested_items.description: The source documents used to generate Amazon Q Business web experience message.

nested_items.name: title
nested_items.description: The title of the document which is the source for the Amazon Q Business generated response.

nested_items.name: snippet
nested_items.description: The content extract from the document on which the generated response is based.

nested_items.name: url
nested_items.description: The URL of the document which is the source for the Amazon Q Business generated response.

nested_items.name: citationNumber
nested_items.description: The number attached to a citation in an Amazon Q Business generated response.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the Amazon Q Business application was last updated.

nested_items.name: textMessageSegments
nested_items.description: A text extract from a source document that is used for source attribution.

nested_items.name: beginOffset
nested_items.description: The zero-based location in the response string where the source attribution starts.

nested_items.name: endOffset
nested_items.description: The zero-based location in the response string where the source attribution ends.

nested_items.name: snippetExcerpt
nested_items.description: The relevant text excerpt from a source that was used to generate a citation text segment in an Amazon Q Business chat response.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: The relevant text excerpt from a source that was used to generate a citation text segment in an Amazon Q chat response.

nested_items.name: mediaId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the media object associated with the text segment in the source attribution.

nested_items.name: mediaMimeType
nested_items.description: The MIME type (image/png) of the media object associated with the text segment in the source attribution.

nested_items.name: sourceDetails
nested_items.description: Source information for a segment of extracted text, including its media type.

nested_items.name: imageSourceDetails
nested_items.description: Details specific to image content within the source.

nested_items.name: mediaId
nested_items.description: Unique identifier for the image file.

nested_items.name: mediaMimeType
nested_items.description: The MIME type of the image file.

nested_items.name: audioSourceDetails
nested_items.description: Details specific to audio content within the source.

nested_items.name: mediaId
nested_items.description: Unique identifier for the audio media file.

nested_items.name: mediaMimeType
nested_items.description: The MIME type of the audio file (e.g., audio/mp3, audio/wav).

nested_items.name: startTimeMilliseconds
nested_items.description: The starting timestamp in milliseconds for the relevant audio segment.

nested_items.name: endTimeMilliseconds
nested_items.description: The ending timestamp in milliseconds for the relevant audio segment.

nested_items.name: audioExtractionType
nested_items.description: The type of audio extraction performed on the content.

nested_items.name: videoSourceDetails
nested_items.description: Details specific to video content within the source.

nested_items.name: mediaId
nested_items.description: Unique identifier for the video media file.

nested_items.name: mediaMimeType
nested_items.description: The MIME type of the video file (e.g., video/mp4, video/avi).

nested_items.name: startTimeMilliseconds
nested_items.description: The starting timestamp in milliseconds for the relevant video segment.

nested_items.name: endTimeMilliseconds
nested_items.description: The ending timestamp in milliseconds for the relevant video segment.

nested_items.name: videoExtractionType
nested_items.description: The type of video extraction performed on the content.

nested_items.name: actionReview
nested_items.description: An output event that Amazon Q Business returns to an user who wants to perform a plugin action during a non-streaming chat conversation. It contains information about the selected action with a list of possible user input fields, some pre-populated by Amazon Q Business.

nested_items.name: pluginId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the plugin associated with the action review.

nested_items.name: pluginType
nested_items.description: The type of plugin.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The name of the field.

nested_items.name: displayOrder
nested_items.description: The display order of fields in a payload.

nested_items.name: displayDescription
nested_items.description: The field level description of each action review input field. This could be an explanation of the field. In the Amazon Q Business web experience, these descriptions could be used to display as tool tips to help users understand the field.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of field.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The field value.

nested_items.name: allowedValues
nested_items.description: Information about the field values that an end user can use to provide to Amazon Q Business for Amazon Q Business to perform the requested plugin action.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The field value.

nested_items.name: displayValue
nested_items.description: The name of the field.

nested_items.name: allowedFormat
nested_items.description: The expected data format for the action review input field value. For example, in PTO request, from and to would be of datetime allowed format.

nested_items.name: arrayItemJsonSchema
nested_items.description: Use to create a custom form with array fields (fields with nested objects inside an array).

nested_items.name: required
nested_items.description: Information about whether the field is required.

nested_items.name: payloadFieldNameSeparator
nested_items.description: A string used to retain information about the hierarchical contexts within an action review payload.

nested_items.name: actionExecution
nested_items.description: Performs an Amazon Q Business plugin action during a non-streaming chat conversation.

nested_items.name: pluginId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the plugin the action is attached to.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The content of a user input field in an plugin action execution payload.

nested_items.name: payloadFieldNameSeparator
nested_items.description: A string used to retain information about the hierarchical contexts within an action execution event payload.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, Amazon Q Business returns this token, which you can use in a later request to list the next set of messages.
